name: 9 Lives (Yuvallll4, amifre, Barakalech, OriH)
description:
PLEASE DOWNLOAD THE GAME IF THE WEB VERSION DOESNT WORK

Approximate playtime: Infinite game

This game was made for "UDC jam" in 9 days.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Escape/Tab - Escape menu

1/2/3/scroll - Change between weapons

Left click - Use current weapon

You can change sensitivity in the pause menu

Remember the cat you gave some food to all those years ago?
The one that stayed near your home because it thought it can trust you?
The one that you decided was "too much of a burden" and just threw out?
The one that while trying to find it's way back home got ran over by a train? 

Well, we remember. 

So welcome to your personal suited hell, we'll see how much you like being the helpless cat instead and we'll try to kill you.  Forever. On a train. Just as a symbol.

Credits: Barak Kalech, Amit Frenkel, Ori Hodorov, Yuval Winter, Amit Shir
